trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Parker
There were no other sightings in Parker on or around January 12th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was on a walk around the southern end of our rv park on jan 12, 2012. i know the exact time of this event because i timed it. i timed it because i just left the man that was hired to clean my carpet. i was waiting for it to dry. the exact time was 4:11 pm. sevral minutes later i ran into a friend and we chatted for 3-4 minutes (at most). i then continued on my walk. the total distance of this walk is a little less than 1\2 mile. the route is fairly rectangular. as i was walking along the highway, i was hit by a very strong reflection in the sky off to the south west. i had completed about 80% of the distance of the route. i could see it was about 700-800 hundred feet above the river. it was silver with a dome that had brassy portholes on it. it was about 40-50 feet in diameter. it began to slide slowly to the south. i watched it for about a minute, maybe a few seconds longer before accelerated and disappeared. when i arrived back home, it was 4:33 pm. i was missing about 20 minutes. this is exactly one year from the date that i am missing at least 1\2 hour on a routine drive into parker, az. this ufo matches the first abduction that has been uncovered through hypnosis in 1955 in new jersey and is covered more thoroughly in my blog.
Summary: I observed a silver colored UFO with dome and brass colored ports hovering over the Colorado River while on a walk around our RV park. I am missing 20 minutes of time.
